title: How can I copy and cut the file in the memory and SD card?
answer:
1. A single file copy/cut：enter file manager->Phone storage->select a file from Phone storage list to do long time press, will popup “file option” then to copy or cut. Switch to SD card select “paste”. 

2. Multi files copy/cut：Enter file manager->press menu key->Select file or folder->select multi files need to copy or cut->select “copy” or “cut” then change to SD card and select “paste”.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150429154507727001.png)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150429154508660002.png)
